aliases: Cosmic Assassin<!--It was what he was called from issues 2 to 21 of QUASAR before his true identity had been revealed; and in issue 23
description: Maelstrom is a fictional character that appears in comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character first appears in Marvel Two-in-One #71 (Jan. 1981), and was created by writer Mark Gruenwald.
name: Maelstrom
powers: Use of quantum bands that absorbed virtually unlimited energy from the "quantum zone"
